attributes.action: I would like this site to divulge the number of signatories of all petitions which are negative about Mr Gove in his position as education secretary
attributes.additional_details:
It appears that there is little public voice regarding issues of true importance. We, the voting public may not have the power to remove politicians of whom individuals disapprove. However, perhaps the data contained within this site could speak for itself.
I would like this site to divulge the number of signatories of all petitions which are negative about Mr Gove in his position as education secretary.

rejection.details: This information is already publically available on the e-petitions site.
